definition: to make a formal request/formal request/to make a claim (law)
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: If you expect to enter the university, you should apply now.
sentences.chinese: 要是你指望進入大學，你此刻應該聲請。

sentences.english: You may apply in person or by letter.
sentences.chinese: 你可以親自到場或去信提出聲請。

sentences.english: I have already legally immigrated to the U. S. and do not need to apply for an immigrant visa.
sentences.chinese: 我已正當移居美國，不需要聲請移平易近簽證。

sentences.english: Many of the documents filed were aimed at keeping the organization functioning.
sentences.chinese: 聲請的文件多半是著眼於讓這個組織繼續運作。

definition: preliminary hearing/interrogation (of a suspect)/preliminary examination (of a project etc)
to counter accusations/to protest/to remonstrate/to retort/to plead/to demur/a plea (of not guilty)/a defense (against an allegation)/to enter a plea to a charge (in a law court)
to demand payment of money owing
to bring to justice/to hand over to the law
to re-investigate/to investigate and reconsider a judgment
